## MutexOptions

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/commandkit/src/utils/useful-stuff/mutex.ts" sourceLine="42" packageName="commandkit" />

Configuration options for mutex

```ts title="Signature"
interface MutexOptions {
    timeout?: number;
    storage?: MutexStorage;
}
```

<div className="members-wrapper">

### timeout

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`number`}   />

Default timeout in milliseconds for lock acquisition. Default: 30000
### storage

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`<a href='/docs/api-reference/commandkit/interfaces/mutex-storage#mutexstorage'>MutexStorage</a>`}   />

Storage implementation for persisting mutex data. Default: <a href='/docs/api-reference/commandkit/classes/memory-mutex-storage#memorymutexstorage'>MemoryMutexStorage</a>


</div>
